pages.text: Some natural delights are harder to find than others. Thankfully, with the energies of the pyre, you can convert more mundane objects into more precious items.$(br2)$(standing_stones) $(l:rituals/ritual_transmutation#multiblock)This ritual requires standing stones.$()
Dead bushes will turn into cocoa beans.
Birch logs will transform into jungle.
Birch leaves will transform into jungle.
Pumpkins planted $(info) above still or flowing water will transform into melons.
Pumpkins planted $(info) on sand will turn into cactuses.
Carpets (of any colour) placed over water $(info) by placing carpet on the next block and then sneak-right-clicking the edge of the carpet on top of the water will be converted into lilypads.
Trapdoors placed on top of wool blocks will be turned into cobwebs.
Cocoa beens (of any growth stage) will be converted to carrots.
Fully-grown carrot crops will be converted into newly-planted beetroot crops.
Redstone dust placed on top of leaves will be converted to vines.
Melons placed on top of cobblestone will revert to pumpkins.
